duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform consultations with clients and customize treatment plans.
Administer injectables, dermal fillers, and other aesthetic procedures.
Ensure safe and effective treatment outcomes using clinical expertise.
Educate clients about available treatments, expected results, and aftercare instructions.
Maintain accurate client records and documentation.
Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in aesthetic medicine.
Collaborate with the team to uphold standards of excellence in customer service.
Participate in ongoing training and professional development.

education_certification.credential: Valid Nurse Practitioner license in Virginia.
Preferred experience in administering injectables, dermal fillers, and other aesthetic procedures.
Strong understanding of facial anatomy and a keen aesthetic eye.
